translation:
My good friend and Sir

Not being able to withdraw from the market price any object belonging to the seizure, an order goes to Your Lordship Inácio for the 40$rs. from the receipts, and send to

Your sincere and obliged friend Almeida Piratini, November 9, 1838.

Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães. His Estate in Salso. Letters from the Most Excellent Domingos José de Almeida of November 7 and 9, received on the 18th of the same and answered on the 28th of said [month].
